about.text: I am Ashiq Elahi, IT-skilled professional with strong expertise in Microsoft Office, AI tools, and WordPress, along with basic knowledge of HTML & CSS. Experienced in digital content development, financial record management, and online education support. Proven ability to integrate technology into academic and organizational workflows. Seeking to contribute technical, administrative, and creative skills to a progressive organization in the Middle East.
